name: Disney TH!NK Fast
description:
TH!NK You’re Fast? TH!NK Again! It’s the ultimate trivia showdown that
puts your family to the test. Play as a classic Disney character in a
game-show style quiz game hosted by the Genie. Prove your smarts with
over 5,000 Disney trivia and general knowledge questions. Show off your
speed in the mini-games and fastest-finger game rounds. It’s easy and
fun to play for the entire family!

  • Over 15 unique rounds of game play

  • Be entertained by the Genie and special guests including Stitch,
    Timon, and Sebastian

  • Fun for players of all ages with the unique visual answer system

  • Play as a classic Disney character—Mickey, Minnie, Donald, Goofy and
    more

  • Pick from four locations to set your game – Lilo and Stitch, Lion King
    and more

  • Play with up to 4 people using Wii Remotes or a combination of Wii
    Remotes and Nunchuks

  • Customize your game and pick your favorite rounds to play
